Row.Text: All military units -2 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength, +2 [ICON_Movement] Movement.

AusBull, the legendary leader of Australia, is renowned for a unique tactical approach. While military forces may lack raw combat power, they compensate with exceptional mobility, enabling swift troop movements for surprise attacks or strategic retreats.

Under AusBull's leadership, Australian forces prioritize mobility over brute strength. This distinctive military philosophy grants Australia unparalleled flexibility on the battlefield, using speed and maneuverability to overcome conventional disadvantages.

AusBull inherits all traits of John Curtin while introducing a revolutionary tactical doctrine. The "Bullish Momentum" ability trades direct combat strength for enhanced mobility, encouraging players to adopt more flexible and dynamic strategic approaches.
